product_name: The North Face HyVent Hiker Hat
long_description: Built for adventures under bright, sunny skies or in rainy weather, the Hiker Hat from The North Face keeps your face covered and comfortable with waterproof, breathable fabric and sporty details. HyVentdeg 2-layer waterproof, breathable fabric keeps your head dry; polyester mesh lining moves moisture away from skin to keep you cool and comfortable. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection. Internal terry headband keeps sweat out of your eyes; drawcord can be easily adjusted or removed entirely. The North Face HyVent Hiker Hat features fold-up sides.
short_description: Built for adventures under bright, sunny skies or in rainy weather, the Hiker Hat from The North Face keeps your face covered and comfortable with waterproof, breathable fabric and sporty details.
